name: FreestyleFootball
description:
Official Website

Current Version - 0.1.5

This version just includes a practice mode where you can cycle through Plays/Formations.

Project goals:

  • 8 pre-made teams for a 7v7 online head to head mode.
  • An 11v11 online created teams mode called Freestyle teams.
  • An in depth online and offline franchise mode

Extremely early in development this project page is used to get community feedback before it officially releases in early access on another distribution platform.

This game is being reprogrammed after a year of development and will be finished (There were many more features than appear now and they will be re-implemented). Any feedback, criticism, and ideas are welcome.

The project currently is just a demo where you can go into practice mode and select formations.
